Deprecated API

Contents

  • Classes
  • Methods
  • Constructors
  • Deprecated Classes
    Class
    Description
    mklab.JGNN.core.matrix.SparseSymmetric
    Under development.
  • Deprecated Methods
    Method
    Description
    mklab.JGNN.adhoc.ModelTraining.setVerbose(boolean)
    This method was available in earlier JGNN versions but will be gradually phased out. Instead, wrap the validation loss within VerboseLoss to replicate the same behavior.
    mklab.JGNN.adhoc.ModelTraining.train(Model, Matrix, Matrix, Slice, Slice)
    This method's full implementation has been moved to ModelTraining.train(Model)
    mklab.JGNN.core.Tensor.persist()
    This method may not be present in future versions of the library, depending on whether memory reuse proves useful or nor.
    mklab.JGNN.core.Tensor.release()
    This method may not be present in future versions of the library, depending on whether memory reuse proves useful or nor.
    mklab.JGNN.nn.Model.train(ModelTraining, Matrix, Matrix, Slice, Slice)
    Training data have been moved inside ModelTraining instances to allow a uniform interface for all training scheme automations. Use Model.train(ModelTraining) instead.
  • Deprecated Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    mklab.JGNN.adhoc.parsers.FastBuilder()
    This constructor should only be used by loading.
    mklab.JGNN.nn.Model()
    Prefer using model builders for symbolic model definitions.
